catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Rieti, Moses ben Isaac da
description: Contents: Moses ben Isaac da Rieti, Miḳdash meʿaṭ (ff. 2r-54r). Moses ben Isaac da Rieti, Igeret yaʿar ha-Levanon (ff. 55v-59r). Moses ben Isaac da Rieti, Ḳinah (ff. 59v-60v). Alphabet of Ben Sira (ff. 61r-63v). Anthology of grammatical texts (ff. 64r-66r). Ṭaʿame ha-mitsṿot (f. 66v). Shlomoh ben Eliyah Pontsibontsi, Commentary on the Pentateuch (Genesis) (ff. 67r-68v). Ergon (ff. 69r-172v).
